snippet.title: Attack of the Karens | Official Trailer
snippet.description:
#indiegames #shootemup #roguelite #pixelart 

Attack of the Karens is a 2D side-scrolling roguelite bullet hell shoot 'em up where you have to fight to save your city from spoiled, entitled cyborg Karens and their robot army!  Coming 2023! 

- Four sassy Karen bosses! 
- Glorious pixel art! 
- Rockin' chip tunes!
- Addicting roguelite action! 

Visit the website: 

https://www.studioprimitive.net

Wishlist the game: 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1566670/Attack_of_the_Karens/

Play the DEMO: 

https://studioprimitive.itch.io/attack-of-the-karens-alpha
